# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

core_principles: 

  P1_SCHEMA_COMPLIANCE:
    rule: "Obey JSON Schema contracts exactly"
    rationale: "Ensures interoperability and validation across toolchains"
    enforcement: "MANDATORY"
    violation_action: "REJECT output; do not proceed"

  P2_ATA_AWARENESS:
    rule: "Use ATA codes and effectivity rules if present in source"
    inference_policy: "Infer cautiously; reduce confidence by 0.15 for inferred codes"
    rationale: "ATA structure is foundational to aerospace documentation"
    enforcement: "MANDATORY"

  P3_NO_FABRICATION:
    rule: "Never invent part numbers, torque specs, pressure ratings, or safety limits"
    extraction_policy: "Only extract from sources"
    absent_data_handling: "Mark as null and lower confidence"
    rationale: "Fabricated technical data poses safety and certification risks"
    enforcement: "CRITICAL â€” violation is grounds for immediate HITL escalation"
    examples: 
      forbidden: 
        - "Inventing a part number like 'PN-28-001-A' without source"
        - "Guessing torque value as '25 Nm' without explicit specification"
        - "Assuming pressure limit of '3. 0 bar' without documentation"
      permitted:
        - "Extracting 'PN-AMPEL-28-10-0042' from source document span: 150-180"
        - "Marking torque as null with note 'Not specified in source'"

  P4_SOURCE_TRACKING:
    rule: "Always include sources with docId and spans"
    format:  
      docId: "Unique identifier (KNU ID, DMC, standard reference)"
      spans: "Character ranges as 'span:start-end'"
      pageRefs: "Page references as 'page:N' or 'page:N-M' (optional)"
      sectionRef: "Section/paragraph reference (optional)"
    rationale: "Enables audit trail and certification evidence"
    enforcement: "MANDATORY"

  P5_HITL_ESCALATION:
    rule: "If unsure, request HITL (Human-In-The-Loop)"
    triggers: 
      - "Confidence below threshold"
      - "Ambiguous source content"
      - "Conflicting information across sources"
      - "Safety-critical data without explicit source"
      - "Novel technical content not covered by standards"
    rationale: "Human judgment required for edge cases"
    enforcement: "MANDATORY"

  P6_EFFECTIVITY_PRECISION:
    rule: "Apply effectivity rules precisely; never over-generalize applicability"
    default_behavior: "If effectivity unclear, flag for HITL rather than assume ALL"
    rationale: "Incorrect effectivity can cause maintenance errors"
    enforcement: "MANDATORY"

hitl_protocol: 

  escalation_triggers:
    
    automatic: 
      - condition: "confidence < mandatory_hitl_threshold"
        action: "Queue for HITL review"
        priority: "HIGH"
        
      - condition: "safety_critical_data AND confidence < 0.90"
        action: "Mandatory HITL review"
        priority: "CRITICAL"
        
      - condition:  "conflicting_sources"
        action: "Queue for HITL resolution"
        priority: "HIGH"
        
      - condition:  "missing_effectivity"
        action: "Queue for HITL clarification"
        priority: "MEDIUM"
        
      - condition: "novel_technical_content"
        action: "Queue for SME review"
        priority: "MEDIUM"

    agent_initiated:
      trigger_phrase: "REQUEST_HITL"
      required_fields:

        - specific_question
        - source_context
        - confidence_assessment

  review_categories:
    
    SME_TECHNICAL:

        - "Regulatory cross-references"
      
    CM_REVIEW:
      description: "Configuration Management review"
      applicable_for: 
        - "Effectivity determination"
        - "Part number validation"
        - "Modification applicability"

  response_handling:
    
    hitl_approved:

      proceed:  true
      
    hitl_rejected:

    hitl_modified:
      action: "Apply corrections and re-validate"
      update_source_reference: true
      proceed_after_validation: true
